column4: I can't currently connect to the internet in ubuntu, because I am on a quirky wireless card, but I read that ff is supposed to be a lot better with wireless.  should I attempt to upgrade to the beta now or wait for the full version to come out?
Personally, I've found the BETA at the moment to be totally stable, and better with wireless, so I'd say risk it - but only if it's non-essential.
And no blaming me if it goes wrong.
